name: Fishing Pro 2021
description:
Use the arrow keys or WASD to move your hook. When you're out of line, it rewinds and (hopefully) catches fish !

I didn't have as much time as I'd have liked, lots of things to fix/add, but the basic idea is there :)

Press R to reset.

---

Entry for the Fishing Game Jam 2021

Made with Godot and Aseprite.

Assets:

  • font: PICO-8 mono
